Bloggers Holiday Charity Challenge - Apple

Others are starting to get involved in the Bloggers Holiday Charity Challenge and not using eBay, so it is time to drop eBay from the name.

I’m donating all of my Lounge ad network earnings for November and December to our local food bank 1….And not only that, but after talking with James, he’s decided to sweeten the deal by donating his portion of revenue of any blogger in The Lounge who does the same thing. That’s pretty cool. Dave Donaldson

A big early things to Dave, James, and any other Lounge blogger who takes James up on the deal!

I am still moving forward with my eBay listings. Today’s theme is Apple.

  • iPhone 8GB 2g
  • Apple Wireless Keyboard
  • Mac Office 2008
  • mStand

Remember, 25% of the purchase price of all of these items will go to Alex’s Lemonade Stand.
